short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you have images, where you do not remember where you took it? Just use Where Was It Taken to see on a map where it was taken.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have images, where you don't remember where you took it? Just use our service at Where Was It Taken to retrieve the metadata from the image and see on a map where it was taken.
You can even get a view from street level from the exact location where the image was taken.
